alert.note: Alert for Yazoo (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 11 at 7:34PM CST until March 14 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Yazoo River At Yazoo City affecting Yazoo County. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE SATURDAY NIGHT TO MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Yazoo River At Yazoo City. * WHEN...From late Saturday night to Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 29.0 feet, Minor over bank is flooding is occurring along the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:00 PM CST Friday the stage was 28.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early Sunday morning to a crest of 29.0 feet early Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Sunday afternoon. - Flood stage is 29.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (6 pm CST) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Yazoo River Yazoo City 29.0 28.7 Fri 7 pm CST 28.9 28.9 28.9 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Saturday morning at 1000 AM CST.
